import React, { useState, useContext, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "../../../public/css/pay.css"; import address2 from "../helpers/address2"; import { v4 as uuid4 } from "uuid"; const Payment = () => { const ele = React.createRef(); const [ctrl, setControl] = useState({ play: 0, lev1: 0, lev2: 0, lev3: 0, data: [], val: "", }); const { play, lev1, lev2, lev3, data, val } = ctrl; useEffect(() => { ele.current.addEventListener("focus", () => { setControl({ ...ctrl, play: 1, lev1: 1, data: address2, val: "" }); }); }, []); useEffect(() => { if (play === 1) { document .querySelector(".nav-item-province") .addEventListener("click", () => { setControl({ ...ctrl, play: 1, lev1: 1, data: address2, val: "", }); }); document .querySelector(".nav-item-district") .addEventListener("click", handleItemClick); document .querySelector(".nav-item-ppc") .addEventListener("click", handleItemClickLev2); } }, [play]); const handleItemClick = (e, index) => { let text = e.target.textContent; text += val; setControl({ ...ctrl, lev2: 1, data: data[index].level2s, val: text }); }; const handleItemClickLev2 = (e, index) => { let text = e.target.textContent; text += "," + val; setControl({ ...ctrl, lev3: 1, data: data[index].level3s, val: text }); }; const handleItemClickLev3 = (e, index) => { let text = e.target.textContent; text += "," + val; setControl({ play: 0, lev1: 0, lev2: 0, lev3: 0, data: [], val: text }); }; const handleChangeInput = () => {}; return ( <>
{play === 1 && (
